pr_title: Create course groups in JIRA automatically based on the course short name

timeline.message:
create course groups in JIRA automatically based on the course short name

improve error handling for courses and programming exercises
check that short names are always unique
in case of an error, automatically scroll up in the client
fix course tests by mocking new jira calls
implement removeGroupFromUsers and fix missing @Param in UserRepository
do not delete groups that have not been created in artemis
additional check to prevent the deletion of groups in JIRA
